name: Aisha Rahman
outreach_message:
Dear Aisha,

Thank you for entrusting us with your financial matters. We are committed to ensuring a smooth onboarding process and complying with all relevant regulations. As part of our due diligence, we kindly request that you provide supporting documents to confirm your relationship with the Netherlands. Please submit your ID, proof of work/study/residence, and any other relevant information to facilitate a seamless onboarding process.
We appreciate your cooperation and look forward to welcoming you to our banking family.
Best regards,
[Your Name]
Compliance Outreach Specialist
[Bank Name]

Note: The message is tailored to the specific customer profile provided, taking into account their foreign tax residency status, work/study/property/family connection in the Netherlands, and other relevant factors.
